data.description:
The only player on the Meta Quest that supports MVC 3D decoding (Blu-ray 3D) and MV-HEVC decoding (Apple Spatial Video),  plays movies and VR videos with 4x clarity.

Features include:
	
- Exclusive video display technology: When watching movies and VR videos, you can enjoy 4x clarity.

- The only player on the Meta Quest that supports Apple Spatial Video (MV-HEVC) captured on iPhone 15 Pro, plays directly without transcoding.
	
- The only player on the Meta Quest that supports MVC 3D decoding, supports MVC 3D in the following file formats: Blu-ray 3D ISO, SSIF, mkv, m2ts, ts, mts, etc.
	
- Reads and plays videos on USB-C Flash Drive / SSD / HDD. (supports FAT32 / exFAT / NTFS, supports multiple partitions, supports 2T+ or even 20T).

- Supports network playback of DLNA, SMB 1.0/2.0/3.0, FTP, SFTP, WebDAV, and WebDAVS.

- Intelligent and accurate recognition of projection types (flat, 180° , 360° ), stereoscopic modes (2D, FSBS 3D, HSBS 3D, FOU 3D, HOU 3D).
	
- Smooth and powerful UI.
	
- Immersive, realistic theatres.
